titleStmt.title: Pendragon, or, The carpet knight his kalendar
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

notesStmt.note: Advertisements on prelim. p. [4]-[9] and p. [1]-[2] at end.
Attributed to Thomas D'Urfey. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
References to Dryden's The rehearsal and The hind and the panther. cf. Macdonald.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
